description: Övik Fleece Zip Sweater is a robust, warm mid layer for autumn and winter outings. Inspired by popular Övik Fleece Hoodie, but with a regular collar instead of a hood. Two-way front zipper, and zippered hand pockets. Both the fleece and pocket linings are made from recycled polyester and made using an environmentally friendly method that reduces water and energy use.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Fleece Half Zip - Mens
